LanguageData.Slavery_Abhorrent.label: 혐오함
LanguageData.Slavery_Abhorrent.description: Owning or trading human beings is deeply evil.
LanguageData.Slavery_Acceptable.label: 수용함
LanguageData.Slavery_Acceptable.description: Slavery is a normal, unremarkable part of life.
LanguageData.Slavery_Disapproved.label: 못마땅함
LanguageData.Slavery_Disapproved.description: Slavery is part of life, though it is extremely distasteful.
LanguageData.Slavery_Honorable.label: 명예로운
LanguageData.Slavery_Honorable.description: One who owns and trades slaves should be honored and respected.
LanguageData.Slavery_Horrible.label: 끔찍함
LanguageData.Slavery_Horrible.description: Owning or trading human beings is a horrible thing.
